data.text: Ah, there you are! Oi!!
data.name: Tokai Teio

data.text:
Hey you, you're one of the trainers that talked to 
me after my Selection Race, right? I'm right, aren't I!?
data.name: Tokai Teio

data.text: Well I'm holding a test right now, so come with me!
data.name: Tokai Teio

choices.text: A test!? What's this all of a sudden!?
A test!? What's this all of a sudden!?

data.text:
Well, after the race, Prez said to "find a trainer that I could 
rely on, and to only choose one after careful consideration".
data.name: Tokai Teio

data.text:
If that's the case, the quickest way to decide 
is to do a training session with them, doncha 
think? So I'm holding the test today! Show me 
how good of a trainer you really are♪
data.name: Tokai Teio

data.text:
And just like that my one day of 
training Tokai Teio had suddenly begun…

Hmm, "hopping"? So you want me to hop over each 
of these hurdles, all while staying on one leg…?
data.name: Tokai Teio

data.text: This seems super fun! What time should I aim for?
data.name: Tokai Teio

data.text:
I showed her the time I recommended. 
I set this time to be shorter than 
for the average Uma Musume…

Hmm, I have that long? This'll be a piece of 
cake! Here I go!
data.name: Tokai Teio

data.text:
Even though she looked like she was merrily 
jumping around, Tokai Teio came in much faster 
than the target time!

Phew… Hey, is that all you've got for me? I can 
still go for much more!
data.name: Tokai Teio

data.text:
Afterwards, I coached Tokai Teio through various 
different regimens, but she greatly exceeded 
expectations in every single one of them!

And finished!! How was that? I bet I put 
up better times than anyone else, right?
data.name: Tokai Teio

data.text:
I am, aren't I? Ehehe, feel free to praise 
the unbeaten Teio-sama more and more!
data.name: Tokai Teio

data.text:
Yup. No one's ever beaten me at anything 
ever. Regardless of the type of race, 
I've won them all, and every time I won 
I was praised by everyone!
data.name: Tokai Teio

data.text:
Being praised feels so good, don't you think? 
They praise me because they think I'm amazing!♪
data.name: Tokai Teio

data.text:
For example, when I won my first 
race everyone told me that I did amazing!
data.name: Tokai Teio

data.text: And it felt so, so good!
data.name: Tokai Teio

data.text:
If I'm able to enter the Twinkle Series, 
more and more people will think that I'm great!
data.name: Tokai Teio

choices.text:
And that's why you 
joined Tracen Academy?
choices.processed:
<size=37>And that's why you 
joined Tracen Academy?</size>

data.text: Ding ding ding!! You're absolutely correct♪
data.name: Tokai Teio

data.text:
Nngh! I'm so excited!! I wanna enter a GI race 
as soon as possible!! I want to be called the 
number one Uma Musume!
data.name: Tokai Teio

data.text:
In her eagerness, Tokai Teio doesn't 
even consider the possibility of losing.

However, after seeing just how amazing she really is, 
it's hard to find myself thinking that she'd actually lose.

Oh wait, we were in the middle of the test, 
right? Hey! Is that all you had planned for 
today's regimen? Is it time to cool down?
data.name: Tokai Teio

data.text:
In order to fully understand 
Tokai Teio's abilities, I had one thing left…

choices.text:
To finish up, I would like to 
time you on a 2500 meter race.
choices.processed:
<size=27>To finish up, I would like to 
time you on a 2500 meter race.</size>

data.text:
2500 meters? That's where I'm best! Ah, so you 
wanna see how well I do when I'm most comfortable?
data.name: Tokai Teio

data.text: Okay! I'll be back in a flash♪
data.name: Tokai Teio

data.text: How was my time?
data.name: Tokai Teio

data.text: Oh, a new personal best! Yay♪
data.name: Tokai Teio

data.text: 2500 meters, huh? Just like the Arima Kinen GI race.
data.name: Symboli Rudolf

data.text: Huh, Prez!?
data.name: Tokai Teio

data.text: Why're you here? Did you come to see me!?
data.name: Tokai Teio

data.text: Well, sort of.
data.name: Symboli Rudolf

data.text:
More importantly… hmm… 
Trainer-kun, I apologize for the sudden 
request, but could you time me as well?
data.name: Symboli Rudolf

data.text: Make it the same as Teio's, 2500 meters.
data.name: Symboli Rudolf

data.text:
Eh? You're gonna go for a run too, Prez!? 
Yaay!! You'll do it, right, Trainer!?
data.name: Tokai Teio

data.text: Thanks. I'll start now.
data.name: Symboli Rudolf

data.text: Phew… Trainer-kun, what was my time?
data.name: Symboli Rudolf

data.text: Prez… You were 2 seconds faster than me…!
data.name: Tokai Teio

data.text: Correct, it seems like you've lost this time, Teio.
data.name: Symboli Rudolf

data.text:
Yup, guess I lost! You're amazing, Prez!! 
You really are the strongest Uma Musume, huh!?
data.name: Tokai Teio

data.text: Is that it?
data.name: Symboli Rudolf

data.text: Eh? Huh?
data.name: Tokai Teio

data.text:
Yeah… I'll say it once again, Teio. 
You lost to me, did you not?
data.name: Symboli Rudolf

data.text:
Eh, err? Umm, yes I did. 
And that's why I said you're amazing… eh?
data.name: Tokai Teio

data.text:
I see… Well, don't worry about it. 
Sorry for being so sudden.
data.name: Symboli Rudolf

data.text:
Teio, are you finished with your training? 
Then instead of cooling down, why 
don't you go for a jog outside of campus?
data.name: Symboli Rudolf

data.text: Ah, sure! Trainer, I'll see you later!!
data.name: Tokai Teio

data.text:
Now then, I know it's sudden, but 
I've got something to ask you, Trainer-kun.
data.name: Symboli Rudolf

data.text: What did you think of Teio's demeanor?
data.name: Symboli Rudolf

data.text:
Her soft-spoken manner with which 
she asked her question was daunting.

Tokai Teio has overwhelming power and unending 
ambition, however, she thinks of her idol as the 
inevitable winner in any match, and as such she 
holds no regret at losing. Which means…

choices.text: If she continues like this, it'll be a waste…
choices.processed: <size=39>If she continues like this, it'll be a waste…</size>

data.text:
Ah, I see. A "waste", huh? As expected 
of an academy trainer, you have a keen eye.
data.name: Symboli Rudolf

data.text:
But you're right. If she continues like 
this, Teio will limit her own abilities. 
As an Uma Musume aiming to be the best, 
that would be unfortunate.
data.name: Symboli Rudolf

data.text: Alright, I've decided. I've got a favor to ask of you.
data.name: Symboli Rudolf

data.text: I plan to race with Teio soon, and when that time comes…
data.name: Symboli Rudolf
